attributes.action: Amend the e-petition system to allow people to sign either for or against a proposition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There appear to be several e-petitions that oppose other e-petitions.  It would make things much clearer if every e-petition could collect signatures both for and against a proposition.

rejection.details:
This issue is dealt with in the faqs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
